comment.body: Реклама не повторяется. Однако, если это происходит стабильно, сообщите об этом [сюда](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues?q=sort%3Aupdated-desc+is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen) с указанием шагов повторения.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.primevideo.com/region/eu/detail/0JJL9BHVZFICO3163T63ZJRGFN/ref=atv_plr_landingpage_play](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.primevideo.com%2Fregion%2Feu%2Fdetail%2F0JJL9BHVZFICO3163T63ZJRGFN%2Fref%3Datv_plr_landingpage_play) ### Comment > Only when the video is in full screen mode; while the time bar is displayed on the player and subtitles are visible, once the time bar (the play button that appears when you move the mouse over the video player, etc.) disappears (after the mouse stops moving), the subtitles often do not show up. > The screenshots don't make sense because Amazon blocked them. ``` Username: @punisher018 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/ilivuzl6ka0ooocgc4cw4k448ggg00cenu8snrpln4.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/l7pdt2vloy888co8okg0owwggg88ow4ee5z2ofittw.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.141 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880) Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Language-specific:
AdGuard Turkish ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.1.141&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=3&browser=chrome&filters=2.3.13.17.18.19.20.21.22.208&userscripts_enabled=false&browsing_security_statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_trackers=true&is_third_party_cookies=true&is_first_party_cookies=false&is_referrer=false&is_user_agent=false)
